name: Iberotel Makadi Oasis & Family Resort

reviews.text: The Makadi Oasis Club is a perfect resort for a great family stay. The family rooms are clean, spacious and offer basic plus accomodation. The landscaping of the hotel is very appealing and well kept. Beach access is a couple of minutes away from the resort and the dedicated beach section for the hotel has sufficient sunbeds (at least in December) during any time of the day. The sea is simply fantastic, even for children.
reviews.title: Excellent Familiy Vacation

reviews.text: The hotel staff is extremely friendly, even without bakshish, and you feel welcome everywhere. The various restaurants offer a decent selection of food, which is not spectacular, but fully sufficient for a family vacation. There is definitely enough variety for most people.
reviews.title: Great Pre Christmas Relax.

reviews.text: Children are very well taken care of in the Mini-Club and there is outstanding enterainment provided for them. However, it should be noticed that the main languages spoken are German and Russian. This is also an indication of the of the national split of the guests who stay there. From a German perspective the Russians who stay at this hotel are great and do not follow the stereotypes of noisy Russians, but are simply folks who are great to get along with.
reviews.title: Your dream hotel,except the food!
Holliday
reviews.text: We have thoroughly enjoyed staying at this hotel and would recommend it to anyone travelling with kids.

reviews.title: a piece of heaven
reviews.text: Nice relaxed hotel with good facilities and staff. 2 heated swimming pools, good resturants that certainly have enough variety for a 7-10 day stay. Great for young children with a very good kids club and super facilities. Evening entertainment was just that - entertaining! Rooms are ok and staff very used to people asking to change - for whatever reason, and will do their best to accomodate you. Beach is a short walk, small and if you want to paddle, take sea shoes. Small reef provides amazing fish life and an early morning snorkle is well worth the effort.

reviews.text: I stayed here for 9 days and enjoyed my time. The sun was great the complex was nice. However, there were a few things that both my partner and I felt let the resort down.
reviews.title: A nice complex but more attention to detail needed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice and spacious however not very clean. I understand that we were in a desert area and that it is expected to be somewhat dusty however the bedroom floor was never clean. We both had to walk around with shoes on so that our feet were kept relaltively dirt free. The bathroom was nice but the shower was dated and not very pleasant. It wasn't as clean as it could have been and our showerhead broke on the first evening! Although, we were probably just unlucky with this!

reviews.text: Lots of choice but we both were not very well, although I was particularly careful with what I ate and drank. The pharmacy was brilliant though and the tablets that they provided worked well but it did ruin the first 4/5 days of our trip. reviews.text: It was immaculately kept, rooms cleaned everyday, gardens attended to constantly and all public areas neat,tidy and clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel would be great for families and couples. We (my husband and I) went with another couple and although I wouldn't recommend it for those who like to keep busy on holiday, due to the all inclusive style of not only the hotel but the resort,. we only went for a week and had to book preorganised excursions to Luxor and Mahmya (This island you must see to believe it is an absolute must for ANYONE visiting the area! Great snorkelling) If we had been there for two weeks I think I would have been bored.
reviews.title: This hotel in in Makadi bay, not Hurghada

likes.liked: — Its lovely at night, provides all you need and its clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However this is a review of the hotel so back to that! The main thing I enjoyed about this hotel was the great pool facilities (two large outdoor pools) and the food. I have been to all inclusive hotels in Taba, Egypt and Tunisia and neither came anywhere near to this hotel on variety and quantity.
